captions.text:
Edd crashed the car into the abandoned graveyard
and Matt was bitten by a zombie. So, Edd,

Tom and Tord gathered weapons and fought the
zombie hord. Edd and Tom escaped, but Tord

was bitten. Then after Tord's funeral he rose
from his grave to get Edds help to remove

the curse from his corpse. Meanwhile Matt
did the same thing with Tom. Matt picked the

wrong book however and was sucked in and Tord
found the right one and his corpse was left
at peace. But then Matt returned.

Matt has broken free and returned to spread
the zombie curse all over the town.
It's up to you to defeat Matt and stop the evil!
I'm a smelly butt head who likes to wear dresses.
You're never going to believe what just happened...

Okay, whatever. Just get the weapon and follow
me. I'll explain on the way.
Oh my god! Are you alright? You look terrible!

Okay, well I suggest that I throw molotov
cocktails to the left side of the crowd. This

will cause the zombies to divert down that
alleyway where you will open fire on them

from the window on the second floor. As you
do this I will come in from behind with my
dual pistols and take out the rest.
Take that... You... Zombies!! Haha (Throws up)
Private Brains eyy? Now let's have you live up to your name, and get a haircut! And some highlights.
Oh screw this! Let's just attack already!
Phew! Well, we made it! Oh... Damn... I got bitten...
Well, I guess this is the end...
